scripts.build: npm install && tsc src/jquery.bracket.ts --outFile dist/jquery.bracket.js && minify dist/jquery.bracket.js > dist/jquery.bracket.min.js
scripts.check: tslint src/*.ts && prettier -l src/*.ts src/*.scss *.md *.json *.js && echo 'Format OK' || echo 'Not conforming to prettier, auto-format with: npm run format'
